name: Slime Smith
description:
Thank you for joining the adventure I hope our slime bring you some fun and a smile!

We made this game with a lot of love and hard work and just 3 days for the ScoreSpace Jam 2022! So we hope you like it! We do plan to come back on January (maybe) to add more cute things and challenge to the game.

Please let us know what you think about it.

Objective:

Collect all the monster parts. If you lose one you'll lose one heart.

Controls: Finish the slimeFReset to centerSpaceEsc
Exit the game Credits:

Baggie - Artist

Cindy Rivera - UX/UI 

Cal Davitt - Programmer
